channel.title: Introduction on Ticki's blog

item.title: About me
item.description: I’m Ticki, this blog is about programming, mathematics, and politics. People in the Rust community might know my for Redox OS, Termion, and the Î -type RFC. I’m the author of Ralloc, TFS, and SeaHash as well. My primary interests are abstract algebra (most field theory and Galois theory), OS development, algorithms, and type systems. I enjoy music, and especially classical music. My favorite classical composers are Chopin, Lizst, Debussy, and Satie (in that order).
